name: Combo-Slinger
description:
Description:

Reflexes and skills are required to help you unlock your potential. Shoot one target after the next to build up your score. Don't miss though! Even Jesse James started at a range. Will you unleash your inner combo-slinger and be the best in the West, or just fade into the common?

How to play:

  • It does not get simpler, point and shoot.
  • Keep your chain as high as possible. 
  • After a chain of 5, modifiers are applied to your score!
  • Missing results in a chain break, which resets your modifier.
  • Some objects are interactable. Shoot them to see what happens.

P.S. Your accuracy is a bit off as you have not really held a gun before.

Game Jam: Wanna Yam Game Jam 2022
Theme: Combination
Period: 06/08/2022 - 15/08/2022

HAVE FUN
